content.raw:
It acts similar to that except that I have the updated grasping code running and the new URDF..  Also, the hands close fine now and I am able to turn the wheels stably in task 1.  So this is a different issue.

Also, the weight of the panel is a problem.  I just pulled the panel off the table (since the arm cannot lift it) and it went right to the ground, taking Val's arm along for the ride and then of course Val just collapsed.
content.html:
It acts similar to that except that I have the updated grasping code running and the new URDF.. Also, the hands close fine now and I am able to turn the wheels stably in task 1. So this is a different issue.

Also, the weight of the panel is a problem. I just pulled the panel off the table (since the arm cannot lift it) and it went right to the ground, taking Val's arm along for the ride and then of course Val just collapsed.
